privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Padel Tracker privacy policy. Learn what data we collect and how we use it.
privacy.intro: At Padel Tracker, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.
privacy.section1Text1: We use Google Analytics 4 to understand how the application is used. This includes: pages visited, usage time, device type and browser, approximate geographic location (country/city). Google Analytics does not collect personally identifiable information. You can disable tracking by using browser extensions like Google Analytics Opt-out.
privacy.section1Text2: If you choose to sign in with Google, we store: your name and email address from Google, your language preference, your match history and statistics. This data is stored in Supabase (our database provider) and associated with your account.
privacy.section1Text3: When you share match results, the match data (player names, scores, statistics) is stored on our server to generate the shared results URL. This information is public and accessible by anyone with the link.
privacy.section2Text: We use the collected information to: provide and improve the match tracking service, generate shareable statistics and results, analyze application usage to improve it, maintain your match history (if signed in).
privacy.section3Text: Match data without an account is processed locally in your browser and is not stored on our servers unless you share the results. Account data and saved matches are stored in Supabase, hosted on AWS infrastructure.
privacy.section4Text: We use: session cookies for authentication (if signed in), localStorage to save your language preference and ongoing match data, Google Analytics cookies for usage analysis.
privacy.section5Text: We use the following third-party services: Google Analytics 4 (usage analysis), Google OAuth (optional authentication), Supabase (database and authentication). Each service has its own privacy policy that we recommend you review.
privacy.section6Text: You can: use the app without creating an account or signing in, delete your match history from your profile, sign out at any time, contact us to request deletion of your data.
privacy.section7Text: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us at:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.metaDescription: Padel Tracker terms and conditions of use.
terms.intro: By using Padel Tracker, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.section1Text: Padel Tracker is a free web application for real-time padel match tracking. It allows you to record points, statistics, and share results. The service is provided "as is" without guarantees of availability or uninterrupted operation.
terms.section2Text: You can use Padel Tracker for free, with or without an account. You may not: use the service for illegal purposes, attempt to access other users' data, interfere with the operation of the service, use bots or automated scripts without authorization.
terms.section3Text: Account creation is optional and done through Google OAuth. By creating an account, you are responsible for maintaining the security of your session. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
terms.section4Text: When you share match results, the content becomes public and accessible through the generated URL. You are responsible for the player names and any information you enter. We do not store information beyond the match data (names, scores, statistics).
terms.section5Text: Padel Tracker, its design, code, and brand are the property of its creators. Your match data belongs to you and you can delete it at any time from your profile.
terms.section6Text: Padel Tracker is provided without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for: loss of match data, service interruptions, errors in scoring or statistics, misuse of shared results by third parties.
terms.section7Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the update date.
terms.section8Text: For questions about these terms, you can contact us at:

landing.heroSubtitle: Real-time scoring, detailed statistics, and shareable results for every match
landing.whatIsTitle: Everything you need for your padel matches
landing.feature1Desc: Track every point with winners, unforced errors, forced errors, and special shots (magias)
landing.feature2Desc: Player stats, team stats, momentum charts, streaks, break points, and point distribution
landing.feature3Desc: Generate shareable links with full match statistics to share on WhatsApp and social media
landing.feature4Desc: Sign in to save your matches and track your progress over time with win rates and trends
landing.step1Desc: Enter the names of all 4 players and configure the format: games per set, number of sets, and deuce type.
landing.step2Desc: Record winners, forced errors, unforced errors, and special shots. The app calculates the score automatically.
landing.step3Desc: When the match ends, generate a link with full stats: player effectiveness, streaks, breaks, and momentum.
landing.manifestoQuote: What you can't measure, you can't improve
landing.manifestoDesc: Padel Tracker was built so every match counts. Whether you're a coach, amateur, or professional player: having real data about your game helps you improve.
landing.useCase1Desc: Show your students real stats from their matches. Identify patterns, measure progress, and give feedback based on data, not feelings.
landing.useCase2Desc: Take your weekly padel session to the next level. Compare performance, spark healthy competition with results, and keep a history of every match.
landing.previewTitle: Everything on court, on your phone
landing.previewDesc: Interface designed for courtside use: fast, intuitive, and distraction-free.
landing.trackerCtaTitle: Ready to track your next match?
landing.trackerCtaDesc: no registration required. Just set up your teams and start tracking.
